name: X-Currency – The Ultimate WooCommerce currency switcher for a smoother shopping experience
description: Woo Currency Switcher lets you handle multi-currency seamlessly, allowing customers to switch currencies on your WooCommerce store easily.

name: OptinCraft – The Powerful Drag & Drop Popup Builder for WordPress
description: Build stunning and high-converting popups with OptinCraft, the powerful drag and drop popup builder for WordPress to boost sales and engagement.
